name: Get Down Mr. Lucifer!
description:
Heaven is invading Hell, and you're on Lucifer's payroll as his bodyguard. Get deep into the ninth circle and yank him out.

Play as Dunkann as he descends into the bottom of the ninth circle of hell, hurry up before Heaven's cherubs catch up to you.

Use Dunkann's scythe to avoid perilous threats by teleporting to walls, stop time to line up perfect shots, and leech life from cherubs.

Authors Trungler - Elias Diez - Game Design & Level Design

https://www.trungler.com/p/home.html

A624T- Andrew Tuazon - Artist

https://itch.io/profile/illusivecenter

@andrewtuazonart on Instagram

Cinderblade - Daniele Zannotti - Programming & SFX

https://ldjam.com/users/cinderblade/

gmor - Guilherme Morandi - SFX Lilla Stipp - Fmod Implementation

https://blueberry-pancakes.itch.io/

Bruno Marques - Music

Instagram : obrunomarques

Controls

WASD - MOVEMENT 

LMB - THROW SCYTHE 

RMB - RECOVER SCYTHE 

SHIFT - TELEPORT TO SCYTHE 

MW DOWN - DRAG ATTACHED ENEMY TO YOU 

E - LEECH LIFE FROM NEARBY ENEMY 

Q - FREEZE TIME
